requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i5 of latest generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1060 with 6GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Motherboard with WIFI/BT & leave space for a second 8GB RAM & at least 500GB SSD
